acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should not create instances of non-instantiable classes
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldNotcreateInstancesOfNonInstantiableClasses

test-step.description: Given a Podam Factory with external factory
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.NonInstantiatableClass
Then the object should be null
Then the two objects 1 and 1 should be equal
Then the two objects class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.NonInstantiatableClass and class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.NonInstantiatableClass should be equal
Then the two objects 0 and 0 should be equal
